fr.cdiEnterprise.dao

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cdiEnterprise.dao.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class server, which is actually a message container. message are stored in a hashmap and keys are identified by receiver. a second map will be used to store the sender's draft email.
    Version:
    : 2016-01-10
    Author:
    Nicolas Tarral

      Server()

      static Items getAllItems(java.lang.String rcv, boolean draft)
      This method is going to get an array list with draft or message
      static Item popMessage(java.lang.String usr, java.lang.String identifier, boolean draft)
      This method is going to remove one message at a time, the mailbox will need to be provided , as well as the email id to remove and also to remove draft or not
      static boolean post(Item item)
      this method is going to post a message to a receiver
      static boolean postDraft(Item item)
      this method is going to post a message into the sender draft folder.

    • Method Detail

      • post

        public static boolean post(Item item)
        this method is going to post a message to a receiver
        Parameters:
        item - message to be delivered
        Returns:
        boolean which tell if the message has been properly delivered.

      • postDraft

        public static boolean postDraft(Item item)
        this method is going to post a message into the sender draft folder. in that case the timeStamp is not set up.
        Parameters:
        the - item that was created by the sender and need to be stored in the draft folder.
        Returns:
        indicate if operation successfully happened

      • getAllItems

        public static Items getAllItems(java.lang.String rcv,
                                boolean draft)
        This method is going to get an array list with draft or message
        Parameters:
        rcv - is for identifying the mailbox
        draft - will tell if the message to look for is a draft or a message
        Returns:
        an Arraylist of message.

      • popMessage

        public static Item popMessage(java.lang.String usr,
                              java.lang.String identifier,
                              boolean draft)
        This method is going to remove one message at a time, the mailbox will need to be provided , as well as the email id to remove and also to remove draft or not
        Parameters:
        usr - is the mailbox of the user.
        identifier - is the message ID to find the proper message to remove
        draft - tell if the message to be removed is draft.
        Returns:
        a boolean telling that the message has been removed from the list.
